Posts.Title: If you had oncotype, what was your score?

Posts.Content: i started taking tamoxifen in december 2009 after chemo and radiation, i was diagnosed in april 2010 with breast cancer again in opposite breast . my oncoligist has kept me on it since i was diagnosed the second time. teresa
Posts.Title: reoccurance question

Posts.Content: i finished chemo sep 17,2009 i gained weight during it steroids i think . i tried to keep walking during treatment but working everyday i was too tired. i have lost 15 pounds since and thats it. i went yesterday morning to see a plastic surgeon to start reconstruction on my right side and to have my left breast removed. she informed me that i must loose 40 pounds before she will do the reconstruction .i informed her i walk everymorning at 5am for 1 hour before i go to work and i dont sit at work i am moving and i also eat healthy .i dont eat a bunch of junk. so i will be calling the surgeon to remove the left one and be done with it. i just wondered if anyone else has went through this. i actually wanted to dig a hole and crawl in it. when i get ready if i have reconstruction i wont go back to her she was very rude! thanks teresa
Posts.Title: my first plastic surgeon visit not good

Posts.Content: congrats you are almost done! :o) teresa
Posts.Title: Going for next to last treatment for radiation in a snow storm.Am I nuts(probley).

Posts.Content: have a wonderful day!
Posts.Title: Today is Cheryl4's Birthday!

Posts.Content: i started tamoxifen in december and i have noticed depression, crying and not much energy i havent seen my oncologist since i started it but i am going to tell him when i do .i take nothing else but it. hope things get better for you. :0) teresa
Posts.Title: Cry

Posts.Content: wishing you the best sunrae! teresa
Posts.Title: Finally Made My Decision Re Surgery

Posts.Content: i had a lumpectomy on my left side in 2009 a year later i was diagnosed with breast cancer on the right side i had a masectomy i was big busted a E i made the choice to have a masectomy on the left side to i was lopsided and i didnt want one big boob hanging i was glad i did it. i was also told by a plastic surgeon that i was to over weight for reconstruction she told me i needed to drop 50 pounds. i just had the latissimus dorsi reconstruction in jan and i never lost the weight i found another surgeon that did the surgery it was 5 hours and i did just fine . i would check around with other plastic surgeons they are all different. wishing you the best teresa
Posts.Title: Single or Double Mastectomy

Posts.Content: just wanted to say im sorry linda and your dog is very cute,,, teresa
Posts.Title: If I didn't have kids . . .

Posts.Content: i have been on tamoxifen since 2009 i was taking mine later in the day and was having night sweats i switched to taking it in the morning and the night sweats were gone. we are all different but i havent had the problem with hot flashes since i started taking it. good luck to you hope it gets better. teresa
Posts.Title: How to minimize hot flashes from Tamoxifen?

Posts.Content: i did 4 rounds of chemo i never lost my eyelashes or eye brows some people will tell you anything to make money!best of luck to you :0) teresa

Posts.Content: i had a open surgery biopsy came back stage 2 idc. i had chemo and radiation, i never once considered no surgery or treatment i want to live! best of luck to you. teresa
